name: org.cmoa.records.collection_and_teenie_harris
title: Collection of the Carnegie Museum of Art & the Teenie Harris Archive.
description: Carnegie Museum of Art is making public the collections records of all of its accessioned artworks. This release contains data on approximately 27365 objects across all departments of the museum; fine arts, decorative arts, photography, contemporary art, and the Heinz Architectural Center.  Additionally, the metadata for the Teenie Harris Archive has been included. For ease of use, they are contained within their own files, but it includes approximately 58753 records using the same structure and format.
author: Carnegie Museum of Art (http://www.cmoa.org)

resources.name: cmoa_collection
resources.description: Metadata for all publically released, accessioned objects in the collection of the Carnegie Museum of Art.

resources.name: teenie_harris
resources.description: Metadata for all publically released, accessioned objects in the Teenie Harris Archive.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The main title that identifies the object or artwork. No multiples.

fields.name: creation_date
fields.description: The human readable date of creation for the object. Note that this is a string and may not be a valid date.

fields.name: creation_date_earliest
fields.description: This is the earliest date the object could have been created. May be null if no date known. May be the same as creation_date_latest, which indicates an exact date known.

fields.name: creation_date_latest
fields.description: This is the latest date the object could have been created. May be null if no date known. May be the same as creation_date_earlier, which indicates an exact date known.

fields.name: medium
fields.description: Material of which this is this object/artwork is made.

fields.name: accession_number
fields.description: This is a number assigned by the museum when it takes official ownership of an object.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique string that identifies the record of the object in the collections database.

fields.name: credit_line
fields.description: Identifies and gives credit to the person, foundation, or method by which the object was acquired.

fields.name: date_acquired
fields.description: The date the object became the legal property of the museum.

fields.name: department
fields.description: The department within the museum that is responsible for the item.

fields.name: physical_location
fields.description: The location of the object/artwork within the museum. When an object is on view in the galleries, a specific gallery location is given. When an object is in storage, the location will only say Not on View. If an object is on loan to another institution, it will say on loan.

fields.name: item_width
fields.description: The maximum width of the artwork/object in inches.

fields.name: item_height
fields.description: The maximum height of the artwork/object in inches.

fields.name: item_depth
fields.description: The maximum depth of the artwork/object in inches.

fields.name: item_diameter
fields.description: The maximum diameter of the artwork/object in inches.

fields.name: web_url
fields.description: The URL of the collection page for this item.

fields.name: provenance_text
fields.description: The ownership history of an object/artwork.

fields.name: classification
fields.description: The name of a group to which the work belongs within the museum's classification scheme, based on similar characteristics.

fields.name: image_url
fields.description: The URL of a thumbnail image of the artwork.

fields.name: artist_id
fields.description: This is a unique identifier for the artist.

fields.name: party_type
fields.description: This is the type of entity represented.

fields.name: full_name
fields.description: The full name of the artist, creator, or creators, who made the object.

fields.name: cited_name
fields.description: The name of the artist as used in a standard citation, with surname first, and forename last.

fields.name: role
fields.description: Describes a personâ€™s involvement with this object.

fields.name: nationality
fields.description: The nationality of the artist/creator.

fields.name: birth_date
fields.description: The birthdate of the artist/creator. Precision may vary based on how much is known about the artist

fields.name: death_date
fields.description: The death date of the artist/creator. Precision may vary based on how much is known about the artist

fields.name: birth_place
fields.description: Name of place of birth, with as much specificity as possible, preference is for City, Country if known. If city is unknown, then list only country.

fields.name: death_place
fields.description: Name of place of death, with as much specificity as possible, preference is for City, Country if known. If city is unknown, then list only country.
